name: The Monster Interview Files
description:
Decades after the Monster Declaration was announced, Monster kind has been living amongst humans and have worked hard to build their own stable society in the world of Man. All their cultural diversity and acceptance eventually led to the establishment of New Marseille becoming one of the most renowned Monster friendly cities in the world.

Five  randomly selected Monsters were asked to give their opinions and what their everyday lives are like in New Marseille; The famous city of Monsters. Both the good and the bad.
